text: Dr Cormac is professional doctor who gave great advices and encouragement. He would explain my condition in detail, provide thoroughly explanation on my recovery process and work with me through the process. With his help, I have gotten back to my favorite sport in time for my upcoming competition!

I've been seeing Dr. Cormac for my knee injury, and I couldn't be more grateful for the care and expertise provided. Due to an emergency, he took the time to reply me after hours and gave me a consultation slot the next day.

His deep understanding of sports injuries, combined with a patient and reassuring approach, made a huge difference in my confidence throughout the healing process.

Dr Cormac a world-class sports doctor in Singapore. He is able to use ultra sound to diagnose possible ACL knee injuries and has treated many National athletes. I have seen him for many years and he always gives advice that I trust. He also will not recommend surgery if you do not need it. I am thankful to have such an exceptional doctor like him!

Dr. Cormak is a highly experienced and knowledgeable specialist and we are blessed to have him help us whenever my 16yr old boy has any sports related injuries. He is very professional, kind and helpful and always straight to the point to address an issue. We highly recommend dr. Cormak to anyone who suffers with any sports related injuries !

Dr Cormac has a wonderful manner. We went with my teenage daughter who had an ankle injury. He put her at ease and talked to her at length about what had happened, working with her and explaining everything along the way.
